data.system_settings: iPhone 6s - iOS 11.4, iPad Air 2 - iOS 11.4.1 PB
data.actual_result: All voice channels work when you have the move member role permission.
data.expected_result: Only voice channels where you have move member options should be shown and work for moving members.
data.short_description: You can move members to voice channels without permissions for it
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a role with the voice permission `Move members` - Have or create at least 2 voice channels - Create permission overrides for one of this voice channel and deny the permission for everyone to move members - Assigns the role you have created before to any account that is not an admin - Join a voice channel and don't leave it - Open your second account (the one with the role you have assigned) - Click on the voice channel your first account has joined - Click on the 3 dots - Observe the channels for the move member option and try to move it to a voice channel where you don't have the permission for it
